rows.label: qst202018_msg004
rows.name:
They seemed to be getting on just
fine, from what I saw.

rows.label: qst202018_msg005
rows.name: Made sure to hand over golden bracers!

rows.label: qst202018_msg006
rows.name:
Good, good.
That's another thing off my mind.

rows.label: qst202018_msg007
rows.name:
How were Artus and Noelia?
They must have grown quite
a bit since I last saw them...

rows.label: qst202018_msg008
rows.name:
They both looked like fine, respectable
grown-ups.

rows.label: qst202018_msg009
rows.name:
Oh yeah, they asked us to give you
some things in return.

rows.label: qst202018_msg011
rows.name:
Said they'd love to have a reunion
sometime, too.

rows.label: qst202018_msg012
rows.name:
Oh, that would be wonderful.
I'm getting excited already!

rows.label: qst202018_msg013
rows.name:
I haven't seen them since they got
married. How many years has it been
now...?

rows.label: qst202018_msg014
rows.name:
We really must set a date!
Oh, isn't this good news, Dofusay?

rows.label: qst202018_msg016
rows.name:
So they're getting on just fine, are
they? There I was worrying over
nothing, as usual.

rows.label: qst202018_msg018
rows.name:
'Course he is! Hearing your kids
are coming to visit after a long time,
anyone would be!
